column1: # Definition: A student is classified as resilient if he or she is in the bottom quarter of the PISA index of economic, social and cultural status (ESCS) in the country/economy of assessment and performs in the top quarter of students from all countries/economies, after accounting for socio-economic status.
# Source: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
# Data from the No Ceilings project: http://noceilings.org
# For more about the data, please visit http://noceilings.org/data
